attributes.action: Theresa May to continue as our Prime Minister after brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has done a great job holding up in such a difficult time. 
One of the very best P.M.s in the history of the UK Theresa May has already done so much for this country Delivered 2 deals for Brexit to name a few, Legalising Canibis for medicinal use Sorting out the mess left by Labor for laws they passed in 2009 that caused so many problems for the wind rush generation & people of the sort. Unemployment at its lowest since 1975 Lower council Taxes. Better council services. 20BN NHS Boost
attributes.background:
Theresa May has done a great job holding up in such a difficult time. 
One of the very best P.M.s in the history of the UK Theresa May has already done so much for this country we do not want her to leave. Please stay and and continue to lead in the way she does “ Keep Calm and Keep Leading”

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments.
